Constructor Summary
SplashWindow(java.awt.Frame owner, java.awt.Image logo, int numberOfSeconds)
          This constructor initializes SplashWindow by calling the parent constructor to set ownership, uses the Image logo to construct a label, and the sets up a window listener to close the SplashWindow before pause number of seconds if clicked on by the user.

Constructor Detail

SplashWindow

public SplashWindow(java.awt.Frame owner,
                    java.awt.Image logo,
                    int numberOfSeconds)
This constructor initializes SplashWindow by calling the parent constructor to set ownership, uses the Image logo to construct a label, and the sets up a window listener to close the SplashWindow before pause number of seconds if clicked on by the user.
Parameters:
owner:Ljava.awt.Frame - the parent frame which created an instance of the SplashWindow.
logo:Ljava.awt.Image - the image to display on the screen.
numberOfSeconds - an integer number of seconds to display the splash window.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
run is called by a Thread created by the parent application. Run is responsible for centering and displaying the SplashWindow on the user's desktop for pause number of seconds.
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
